General information. Monarch is a charter and scheduled airline, founded in 1967 in England. The carrier operating from its Luton Airport hub is one of the UK's major charter airlines. Officially this carrier is considered a low cost one, however it was established primarily to operate charter flights.

Monarch Airlines International Routes. Browse the most popular Monarch Airlines flight routes to cities all over the world. Expedia can help you make reservations on Monarch Airlines for international flights to all major cities and thousands of other destinations.

The carrier operating from its Luton Airport hub is one of the UK's major charter airlines. Officially this carrier is considered a low cost one, however it was established primarily to operate charter flights.

Monarch Airlines Check-in. Check-in desks close 40 minutes before departure for short-haul flights and 60 minutes before departure for long-haul flights, though the airline advises arriving at the desk at least 90 minutes before departure for all flights. Online check-in is available.
